meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Allie Hagan Tom Zamojcin Charlie Penrod Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6032.

td.p: Allie Hagan, an education policy consultant from Washington, D.C.
Tom Zamojcin, a digital marketing manager from Phoenixville, Pennsylvania
Charlie Penrod, an assistant professor of law from Natchitoches, Louisiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,000)

tr.td: NAME THAT COUNTRY
SONGS ON TV SHOWS
"G"ROCERIES
DOWN ON THE FARM
MASSACHUSETTS STATE SYMBOLS
PEACEFUL, EASY FEELING
